todos.title: Product Narrative
todos.body: Motivation for developing the product.  Problems you get from your customer interviews (ex Facebook ' Mark there is a girl in your class, do you know if she is single?).  Customer ' Insight ' Problem ' Solution.

todos.title: Protagonist
todos.body: Every story has a hero that is trying to solve the problem.

todos.title: Story Structure
todos.body: Characters/Customers (Good or Bad), Motivation/Problem Definition, Insights/Comparative Advantage, Solution/Value Proposition, Symbols (Meaningful Objects)

todos.title: Intellectual Guard
todos.body: When you are in a good story, you drop your intellectual guard and don't think about whether it is realistic or not.

todos.title: Pixar
todos.body: Takes 5 years to make a movie.  They spend 4 years (80%) of time just developing the story.

todos.title: BIG Problem
todos.body: Every story starts with a big problem.

todos.title: Insula
todos.body: Emotional region of the brain that is activated by a good story.
